bike.description: Hi-Ten plain gauge steel, 20.5" top tube, externally relieved MID BB shell and integrated head tube, hydra-formed chainstays, seatstay-mounted U-brake bosses, 5mm thick dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: 20" BMX, 2mm thick Hi-Ten, tapered blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 5mm Cr-Mo dropouts for 3/8" axle
Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
BMX stem, die cast alloy, top load, 50mm length, 22.2mm
Specialized P.Series BMX bar, Hi-Ten steel, 710mm wide, 210mm rise, 11º backsweep, 2º upsweep, 22.2mm
Specialized P.Grip, flanged soft compound, end plugs, 150mm
Wide tire U-brake, die-cast, single bushing, coil spring, 15mm offset arms, w/ 1pc. black pads
Lever "U" brake, 15mm cable pull
1 pc. CNC 1/2" x 1/8" x 9t driver
KMC Z-510H, 1/2" x 1/8", anti-drop inner links
3pc. tubular Cr-Mo, 8-spline, 175mm
25t, 2.5mm thick steel
MID BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm, 8-spline Cr-Mo spindle, alloy tube and cone spacers
Specialized P.Series Plastic platform w/ molded pins, loose ball, 9/16"
Specialized P.Series, 20", alloy single-wall, center void, 32mm, pin joint, 36h
Specialized P.Series BMX, alloy, loose ball, 36h
Specialized P.Series BMX, alloy, loose ball, hollow axle, 36h
Stainless, 2.0mm (14g)
Specialized Compound Street, 20x2.3", wire bead, 30TPI
Specialized Compound Street, 20x2.3", wire bead, 30TPI
Schraeder valve
Specialized P.Series 1pc co-molded composite saddle & alloy 25.4mm seat post combination w/ debossed "P. Series" logo padded cover
Alloy, no offset, 25.4mm, integrated w/ saddle
Integrated Cr-Mo bolt and nylock nut
Owner's manual, chainguard, reflectors
